About Me

I am a product-focused Full Stack Developer with a passion for building clean, accessible, and performant web applications. With a strong foundation in the MERN stack and Next.js, I thrive in fast-paced environments where I can own features from concept to deployment. I write code that is easy to read, test, and maintain.
